title: Remixed Affairs
text: Remixed Affairs is the second album and first remix album by the <a href="Denmark">Danish</a> <a href="dance%20music">dance</a>/<a href="house%20music">house</a> act <a href="Infernal%20%28Danish%20band%29">Infernal</a>, released in 1998 in <a href="Denmark">Denmark</a>. It contains two complete new tracks aside from six remixes, two live tracks and a megamix.
